title: Shap values Error when using XGBoost Sklearn API
body:
I trying to use TreeExplainer.shap_values with a XGBRegressor. But I'm getting the following below.
The same code works if model is an ExtraTreesRegressor for example. Could anyone tell me what might be causing this?
```bash
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
ValueError                                Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-100-adb413970450> in get_shap_res(lag, models, label)
      6     explainer = shap.TreeExplainer(model)
----> 7     shap_values = explainer.shap_values(X)
      8 
      9     # visualize the first prediction's explanation (use matplotlib=True to avoid Javascript)

/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/shap/explainers/tree.py in shap_values(self, X, y, tree_limit, approximate)
    177                 phi = self.model.original_model.predict(
    178                     X, ntree_limit=tree_limit, pred_contribs=True,
--> 179                     approx_contribs=approximate, validate_features=False
    180                 )
    181 

/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/xgboost/core.py in predict(self, data, output_margin, ntree_limit, pred_leaf, pred_contribs, approx_contribs, pred_interactions, validate_features)
   1243                     preds = preds.reshape(nrow, data.num_col() + 1)
   1244                 else:
-> 1245                     preds = preds.reshape(nrow, ngroup, data.num_col() + 1)
   1246             else:
   1247                 preds = preds.reshape(nrow, chunk_size)

ValueError: cannot reshape array of size 2855439 into shape (18663,0,6513)
```
